segments.text: Have you got anything for diarrhea ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here you are . These tablets are very effective .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How should I take this medicine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take two tablets every six hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'll follow your instructions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And take a good rest for a few days .
segments.speaker: S2
